title: Apostle Islands National Lakeshore: Multimedia Presentations
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Multimedia Presentations              Multimedia Presentations                         Camping Orientation A guide to planning a camping trip in the park.  Duration:4 minutes, 55 seconds                                Safely Back to Shore A guide to paddling in the Apostle Islands.  Duration:6 minutes, 55 seconds                                Raspberry Story The story of Raspberry Lighthouse.  Duration:3 minutes, 57 seconds                                Leave No Trace Camping in the Apostle Islands. This video describes the facilities and conditions that campers will encounter in the park and recommends practices to minimize visitor impacts to park resources  Duration:6 minutes, 1 second                                Plovers in the Apostles This film illustrates piping plover natural history and the efforts of the NPS to study and protect this endangered species  Duration:2 minutes, 1 second
